title: Sci-Fi Background Ambience Loops Vol 2 - Dark Halls
description: Enhance your Sci-Fi game with our immersive background noise and atmosphere loops. Volume 2 focuses on indoor areas such as echoing spaceship corridors, futuristic structure halls, mysterious passageways, and more.
longDescription:
Volume 2 invites you to explore the subtle ambiance of echoing spaceship corridors, futuristic structure halls, and mysterious passageways. Seamlessly blending with your chosen music, these atonal sounds create a harmonious audio experience. Craft unforgettable soundscapes and elevate your sci fi game from good to great with immersive soundscapes and atmospheres.

technicalDetails:
* By adding these sci-fi soundscapes underneath your music or sound effects, you create a rich audio environment. It was a lot of fun working on this pack, and I'm happy to say that these series will continue!*


Number of Audio Wavs: 15

Number of Audio Cues: 15

Sample rate/bit rate: 16bit 44.100 Wav.

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 26:51

Supported Development Platforms: All
